scripts.build:wasm: mkdirp dist && wa compile -D SEN_BUILD_WASM -o dist/seni-wasm.wasm src/c/wasm.c -i src/c/seni/bind.c -i src/c/seni/colour.c -i src/c/seni/colour_scheme.c -i src/c/seni/cursor.c -i src/c/seni/ease.c -i src/c/seni/error.c -i src/c/seni/focal.c -i src/c/seni/genetic.c -i src/c/seni/lang.c -i src/c/seni/lib.c -i src/c/seni/mathutil.c -i src/c/seni/matrix.c -i src/c/seni/multistring.c -i src/c/seni/parametric.c -i src/c/seni/parser.c -i src/c/seni/path.c -i src/c/seni/printf.c -i src/c/seni/prng.c -i src/c/seni/render_packet.c -i src/c/seni/result_functions.c -i src/c/seni/repeat.c -i src/c/seni/shapes.c -i src/c/seni/strtof.c -i src/c/seni/timing.c -i src/c/seni/unparser.c -i src/c/seni/uv_mapper.c -i src/c/seni/vm_compiler.c -i src/c/seni/vm_interpreter.c -I src/c
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run build:js && npm run build:wasm
scripts.build:all:production: npm run clean && npm run build:production && npm run build:wasm
scripts.publish:local: npm run build:all:production && mkdirp app && mkdirp app/server && cp -r assets app/. && cp -r dist app/. && cp -r server/static app/server/. && cp server/target/release/seni-server app/. && cp scripts/isg-start-seni-app.sh app/.
